QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and AFC Bournemouth on Sat, 13 May 2023 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace won 2–0 over AFC Bournemouth on Sat, 13 May 2023 14:00:00 GMT.
